scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --minor && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --patch && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && git push --follow-tags
